channel.title: Opening a shop in the quest tab [PI]

item.title: Opening a shop in the quest tab [PI]
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“sosodeaf, post:3, topic:400470”]Its really easy bro just add this “getPA().sendFrame126(“Summoning Shop”, 29161);” then go onto server click on it and look in your server (black panel thing that runs it) it will say like actionbuttion clicked (20122) the 20122 is the number then go into clickingbuttons and but in
case 20122:
c.getShops().openShop(76);
break;

somthing like that if u need more help feel free to ask![/quote]
I know how to make a shop i need to know how to make a shop inside the questtab.
Edit:Nvm that would work.

Read full topic

item.title: Opening a shop in the quest tab [PI]
item.dc:creator: @sosodeaf sosodeaf
item.description:
@sosodeaf wrote:

Its really easy bro just add this “getPA().sendFrame126(“Summoning Shop”, 29161);” then go onto server click on it and look in your server (black panel thing that runs it) it will say like actionbuttion clicked (20122) the 20122 is the number then go into clickingbuttons and but in
case 20122:
c.getShops().openShop(76);
break;

somthing like that if u need more help feel free to ask!

item.title: Opening a shop in the quest tab [PI]
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Im trying to open a summoning shop in my quest tab for my pi server i tried this i got not errors but it didnt work what would i do?

getPA().sendFrame126("Summoning Shop", 29161); getPA().sendFrame126("c.getShops().openShop(76);", 29162);

Read full topic
